description:
The new Apple Watch should have come with a manual. But it didn't. This course shows you tips and tricks to help skip the learning curve and take full advantage of your new Apple Watch. The course content goes way beyond a review of the features, but actually walks you through the good, bad, and sometimes ugly of this new device.

In this course, you will learn:

  • Basic Functionality of Apple Watch including:
    • How to set an alarm
    • How to manage your calendar
    • How to check Twitter
    • How to use the phone
    • How to check your email
    • How to send text messages
    • How to use the Activity Monitor
  • Advanced features of the Apple Watch including:
    • Tracking tasks to stay on top of what you have to do
    • Get directions home to save you hours of frustration
    • Track your hours to find outwhereyourtimeigoingeveryday.
    • Locating Your Parked Car
    • Use the Apple Watch for studying
    • Changing settings on your Apple Watch
  • Additional tips
    • Becoming an early adopter by mastering new apps
title: Apple Watch - Hands On - The Basics and Beyond
